body_html:
Guys you can close this one. The above occurs when you have TensorFlow installed and then you try and install TensorFlow Serving. I overcome the above by doing a clean build of TensorFlow Serving without having TensorFlow installed and allowing it to pull its own version of TensorFlow from the Git repo.

When I have done subsequent builds, following that approach has resulted in no errors.

body:
Guys you can close this one. The above occurs when you have TensorFlow installed and then you try and install TensorFlow Serving. I overcome the above by doing a clean build of TensorFlow Serving without having TensorFlow installed and allowing it to pull its own version of TensorFlow from the Git repo.

When I have done subsequent builds, following that approach has resulted in no errors.
